item.title: Effective Use of "data.table"
item.description: Introduction data.table is a complex but rewarding package to use. It is by far the most efficient out there for data processing and manipulation. However it can be tricky to get to grips with integrating it in to work flows, especially with many packages being built to fit with tidyverse and offering examples using that collective of packages. Itâ€™s efficient style and operation are worth the extra time to
